about_the_game:
Engine Swap DLC is a completely new way to modify and set up your car.New engines are available for swap now, and they will bring absolutely new tuning and customization possibilities for you to try out.
Get ready for the new drift and handling experience!
Improvise, try different options and combinations, and maybe one day you’ll be the one to set up a new customization standard to follow!

**This DLC gives a quick access to all engine swaps.
detailed_description:
Engine Swap DLC is a completely new way to modify and set up your car.New engines are available for swap now, and they will bring absolutely new tuning and customization possibilities for you to try out.
Get ready for the new drift and handling experience!
Improvise, try different options and combinations, and maybe one day you’ll be the one to set up a new customization standard to follow!

**This DLC gives a quick access to all engine swaps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Asus Radeon RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: AMD-A10 6800K 4.1Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
